ngsmcconfig.confirmreset.text: Are you sure you want to reset your entire config?
ngsmcconfig.confirmunsavedexit.text: There are some unsaved changes, are you sure you want to leave and discard those unsaved changes?
hudder.general.wiki: Click here to open Hudder's wiki in your browser
hudder.general.enabled.tooltip: Whether Hudder should be enabled or not.
hudder.general.mainfile.tooltip: Change the main file§7The file must be located in the §6.minecraft/config/Hudder§7 folder.
hudder.general.mainfile.error: File does not exist in the .minecraft/config/Hudder folder.
hudder.general.scale.tooltip:
Control the default scale of Methods 
§7This can be overriden by elements specifying the size on their own.
hudder.general.folder: §7The files must be located in the "§6config/Hudder§7" folder
hudder.text.color.tooltip: Change the color of the text.
hudder.text.shadow.tooltip: Whether text should have a shadow.
hudder.text.yoffset.tooltip: Control the y offset of the text.
hudder.text.xoffset.tooltip: Control the x offset of the text.
hudder.text.height.tooltip: Control the line height of the text.
hudder.advanced.method.tooltip: Control the amount of lines to be trimmed before and after Methods.
hudder.advanced.f3.tooltip: Should still render when f3 is showing.
hudder.advanced.compilertype.tooltip: Change the type of compiler (ex Hudder, JavaScript, None).
hudder.advanced.unsafeoperations.tooltip:
§4WARNING - ONLY ENABLE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOUR HUD DOES.
§fEnabling this gives access to blocked features as well as removing certain limitations from existing ones (See Wiki for more information).
hudder.text.backgroundcolor.tooltip: Change the default color of the background.
hudder.text.background.tooltip: Whether should add a background to the text by default.
hudder.advanced.removehotbar.tooltip:
§4WARNING - THIS WILL MAKE YOUR HOTBAR AND HEALTH BAR INVISIBLE UNTIL DISABLED.
§fWhether hudder should hide all Hotbar related GUI elements.
hudder.advanced.limitrate.tooltip:
§4WARNING - THIS MAY CAUSE PERFORMANCE ISSUES.
§fDisabling this will move hudder file compilation from running every client tick to running every frame.
hudder.advanced.autorefresh.tooltip: Disabling this will stop your hud from updating with every change. Manual refreshes through the keybind will still function
